description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The 80s super computer, 'Deep Thoughts', is back and printing another evil ASCII army bent on destruction.  Assault the enemy in this original campaign featuring all new levels, additional enemies, and multiple game modes in this arcade action title with unique gameplay and retro style.  Prepare for the ASCII invasion in 3 2 1 ... ATTANCK!
